00122         struct GPUVendorRule
00123         {
00124             GPUVendor vendor;
00125             IncludeOrExclude includeOrExclude;
00126             GPUVendorRule()
00127                 : vendor(GPU_UNKNOWN), includeOrExclude(EXCLUDE) {}
00128             GPUVendorRule(GPUVendor v, IncludeOrExclude ie)
00129                 : vendor(v), includeOrExclude(ie) {}
00130         };
00132         struct GPUDeviceNameRule
00133         {
00134             String devicePattern;
00135             IncludeOrExclude includeOrExclude;
00136             bool caseSensitive;
00137             GPUDeviceNameRule()
00138                 : includeOrExclude(EXCLUDE), caseSensitive(false) {}
00139             GPUDeviceNameRule(const String& pattern, IncludeOrExclude ie, bool caseSen)
00140                 : devicePattern(pattern), includeOrExclude(ie), caseSensitive(caseSen) {}
00141         };
00142         typedef vector<GPUVendorRule>::type GPUVendorRuleList;
00143         typedef vector<GPUDeviceNameRule>::type GPUDeviceNameRuleList;
